snippet: A 14-year-old boy was charged with murder on Friday in the strangling death of his 9-year-old half-sister.
abstract: Fourteen-year-old boy is charged with murder in the strangling death of Katelynn Arnold, his 9-year-old half- sister, in Ragland, Mississippi.
lead_paragraph: A 14-year-old boy was charged with murder on Friday in the strangling death of his 9-year-old half-sister.

headline.seo: Alabama: Teenager Charged in Half-Sister’s Death
headline.main: Alabama: Teenager Charged in Half-Sister’s Death
headline.print_headline: Mississippi: Teenager Charged In Half-sister’s Death
